author: scottwilson
msg: Added tests for the GET method using instance id_key instead of complete instance parameters, consistent with the REST API doc.

author: scottwilson
msg: Made the behaviour of the Widgets controller consistent with the API definition, and added functional tests. Also factored out the representation to a helper class, so each one gets its categories in its XML (see WOOKIE-10).

author: scottwilson
msg: Updated all tests to JUnit4-style (see WOOKIE-27); completed more functional tests; moved GadgetUtils into an Integration tests package.

author: scottwilson
msg: Implemented GET for Participants, returning a representation of participants in the given instance.
